Linux 6.17-rc2 To Better Tune Attack Vector Controls For SRSO Mitigation
item.description: One of the new exciting security features with Linux 6.17 is Attack Vector Controls as a means of easier managing CPU security mitigations depending upon the system/server use-case. It drastically simplifies CPU security mitigation management for only activating the mitigations relevant to intended use.
